product.title: Hop on Pop | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Hop on Pop by Dr. Seuss surely holds a special place in the hearts of pops—and moms—everywhere! Created as “the simplest Seuss for youngest use,” Hop on Pop starts with basic pairs of rhyming words and builds to longer, fun-filled, complete sentences. And each page of Hop on Pop features the clever rhymes and wacky characters that put Dr. Seuss at the top of every child’s reading list!

Tie-in Activity: Try a rhyme-inspired game such as “Hop and Stop.” Say a word and encourage your child to hop or jump until you say another word that rhymes. Or hold your baby near the ground and say, “Baby is so small.” Then lift her up and say, “Baby is so tall!”
